text: Ilingoceros is an extinct genus of pronghorn artiodactyl from the Late Miocene of North America. At in body length, the animal would have been slightly bigger than the related modern pronghorn. It had straight, spiraled horns, which ended in forked tips. ==References== Category:Prehistoric pronghorns Category:Miocene even-toed ungulates Category:Miocene mammals of North America Category:Prehistoric mammal genera Category:Fossil taxa described in 1909
title: Ilingoceros
